entry.title: Sensitivity Conjecture Proof
entry.content:
Hao Huang recently presented a remarkably simple proof of the long-standing Sensitivity Conjecture. Below, I provide an almost self-contained explanation of Huang’s proof. While originally intended for my personal understanding, it may also be helpful to others.

Sensitivity Conjecture Proof.
